title: Redding
name: Hot Shots Family Billiards
price: Billiards before 7 PM: $6/hour, billiards after 7 PM: $12/hour, coin-op games: $1 per game, shuffleboard: $3/hour
content: A pool hall also featuring shuffleboard, arcade, and coin-op games.  Also serves food and beverages (both alcoholic and non-alcoholic).
